links: G. Kuperberg, Symmetry classes of alternating-sign matrices under one roof, arXiv math.CO/0008184 [Th. 5, but the right-hand side should be multiplied by (-1)^(n*(n-1)/2)]
maple: A059490 := proc(n) local i, j, t1; t1 := (-1)^(n*(n-1)/2)*2^(2*n^2-n); for i to n do for j to n do t1 := t1*(4*j - 4*i + 1)/(j - i + n); end do end do; t1 end proc;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2001
